name: Congo Aviation Academy
about: Congo Aviation Academy is an aviation training school founded by Hon Flt Capt. George Micheal Mukula (PhD), driven by his passion for aviation. As an Approved Training Organization (ATO) by the Congo Aviation Authority (CAA), we offer a wide range of specialized courses designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful career in aviation. Our programs include cabin crew training, air cargo management, English language proficiency for aviation, aviation management, quality management, and safety management. Our experienced instructors and modern facilities ensure a high standard of training, preparing students for leadership roles and professional careers in the aviation industry. We are committed to providing a comprehensive and supportive learning environment, helping our students achieve their aviation goals.
services:

Cabin Crew

Flight Operations & Dispatch
